title: Terms of Service
welcomeMessage: Welcome to Prompt Manager. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. Please read the following carefully.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using Prompt Manager services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: Prompt Manager provides a platform that allows users to manage, create, and share AI prompts. We are committed to providing a stable, secure, and efficient service, but we make no guarantees regarding the continuous availability, accuracy, or completeness of the service.

section3.title: 3. User Account
section3.content: To use certain service features, you may need to register an account. You agree to provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information and are solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account. Please keep your account credentials secure and report any unauthorized use to us immediately.

section4.title: 4. User Conduct Guidelines
section4.content: You agree to abide by all applicable laws and regulations when using our services. You shall not post, transmit, or share any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, invasive of another's privacy, or infringing upon intellectual property rights. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: All content on the Prompt Manager platform, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of Prompt Manager or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws. The copyright for user-submitted prompt content belongs to the user, but you grant Prompt Manager a free, perpetual, irrevocable right to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, and display such content worldwide.

section6.title: 6. Privacy Policy
section6.content: Your privacy is very important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose your information. Your use of the service constitutes your agreement to our Privacy Policy.

section7.title: 7. Termination
section7.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to our services at any time, for any reason, including but not limited to violations of these terms, without prior notice. Upon termination, all your rights to use the service will immediately cease.

section8.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties
section8.content: Our services are provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis, without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. We do not warrant that the service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.

section9.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
section9.content: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Prompt Manager shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use or inability to use our services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

section10.title: 10. Governing Law
section10.content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the People's Republic of China, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these terms shall be submitted to the courts with jurisdiction for resolution.

section11.title: 11. Changes to Terms
section11.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these terms at any time. If we make material changes, we will make reasonable efforts to provide you with advance notice. Your continued use of our services after any such changes become effective constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms.

section12.title: 12. Contact Us
section12.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at [Your contact email/method].
